item.description:
After 7 long years and months of anticipation, Futurama will be returning to the airwaves, or digi-waves, for the Premier of season 6 of the cult cartoon classic.

On Thursday, June 24th celebrate the ensuing madness from Omicron Persei 8 with a short 5 miler in homage of the first 5 seasons of soilent humor.

Come prepared with your favorite Futurama quotes and be ready to answer some trivia questions for a chance to win free stuff. Free stuff you say? Maybe presents for Zoidberg?

Run will commence at 6:30pm from The Rock*
ALL ABILITY LEVELS ARE WELCOME!!!
ALL FUTURAMA FANS and non-FANS WELCOME!!!

Street parking is easily accessible on Granite Street.

* "The Rock" is my house, located at the intersection of Granite St. and Rockingham St. It is across the street from Lindstrom Field.

informalrunning.com

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Good News Everyone...Futurama run!
